data.title: Africa's $1.8 Billion Gaming Boom: Why Microsoft Can't Ignore Mobile
data.description: Africa's gaming industry is exploding, with 90% of its $1.8B revenue coming from mobile games. Microsoft's Xbox may need a new strategy to tap into this market dominated by PlayStation. Esports and content creation are also on the rise.

data.title: Uber Q4 Earnings: Revenue Beat, Growth In Rides, Delivery And Autonomous Tech, CEO Calls It Strongest Quarter
data.description: Uber reports 20% revenue growth in Q4 2024, beating analyst expectations. EPS missed consensus, leading to a stock plunge. Outlook for Q1 2025 is positive.

data.title: Insights into T. Rowe Price Gr Q4 Earnings
What's Going On With Plug Power Stock Today?
data.description: Plug Power launches a spot pricing program for liquid green hydrogen, offering flexibility to buyers.

data.title: Equinor Unveils $5 Billion Buyback, Trims Renewables Spending As Oil & Gas Output Rises
data.description: Equinor (NYSE: EQNR) reports Q4 results with revenue and production decline, but beats EPS estimate. Plans to strengthen cash flow and increase renewable energy capacity.
